thread.title: China envoy says takes 'two to tango' in resolving U.S. trade dispute

title: China envoy says takes 'two to tango' in resolving U.S. trade dispute
text:
China envoy says takes 'two to tango' in resolving U.S. trade dispute 12:24pm IST - 00:43 
China's Ambassador to the United States Cui Tiankai said on Wednesday it was China's preference to resolve the trade dispute with Washington through negotiations but ''it takes two to tango.'' Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
China's Ambassador to the United States Cui Tiankai said on Wednesday it was China's preference to resolve the trade dispute with Washington through negotiations but "it takes two to tango." Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2q5aq4k
